quest.name: Master of Marksmanship
journal: Rostnsthal seeks to evaluate your natural talent with a firearm.

Rostnsthal has agreed to test your potential, and instructed you in the fundamentals of firearm use. Meet the master of marksmanship in the Floating City of Nym, and submit yourself to his evaluation.

You have survived Rostnsthal's grueling evaluation, and succeeded in besting the instructor himself. Bound by his word, the master of marksmanship reluctantly agrees to return to the workshop...but not before informing Stephanivien of the reasons for his sudden resignation. Return to the Skysteel Manufactory, and speak with the financially frustrated chief machinist.

Though wishing to reward you more lavishly, Stephanivien's generosity is stifled by House Haillenarte's ailing coffers. The chief machinist instead passes on to you a message from Rostnsthal: master the skills you have learned if you would seek further instruction.

※The next machinist quest will be available from Stephanivien upon reaching level 35.
objectives: Speak with Stephanivien at the Skysteel Manufactory.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: ...For a first-timer, ye look good an' comfortable with that carbine. Pity that comfort'll only last right up until ye shoot the bleedin' thing. Right, 'ere's a few pointers afore we start so's ye don't put a round through yer damn foot.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Aim the barrel at yer target, squeeze the trigger─not too bloody 'ard, mind─an' boom goes the firearm. It's yer shots what'll decide the kind o' damage ye can do with any particular weapon.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Next, let's talk about that contraption at yer waist. Now, I don't rightly understand it, but the boss tells me it draws on the aether in yer body an' turns it into the spark what'll feed some new devices 'e's workin' on.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Oh, and pray do not forget to carry your Soul of the Machinist. I based the design on the more traditional soul crystals, and it will act as a focal point for the energy conversions performed by the aetherotransformer. ...Ah, that would be the “contraption” Rostnsthal mentioned.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have learned all machinist actions and traits to level 30. Detailed descriptions can be viewed in the Actions & Traits window, accessed under Character in the main menu.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Alright, that's all yer gettin' for the now. Follow me, an' we'll see 'ow ye fare in the field...or ye can throw yer carbine in the bushes an' flee like a musket-whipped cur. Them's yer choices.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: You must persuade Rostnsthal to return to us!

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: His lordship has such high hopes for the manufactory's future. I'd hate to see him disappointed...

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Hah! Willin' to take me test, then, eh? The rules is simple: make yer way towards the 'Ermit's 'Ovel, an' shoot what yer told to shoot.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: (-Stephanivien-)I shall await you at the end of your trial, Forename. I have every confidence that you shall impress our instructor with your enthusiasm and potential!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat basalt golems!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat training incendiaries!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat docile miacids and docile tigers!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Docile miacids defeated

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Docile tigers defeated

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Head for the Hermit's Hovel!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat Rostnsthal!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Basalt golems defeated

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Training incendiaries defeated

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: My bullets are spent...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Right, we're gonna 'ave us a good ol'-fashioned 'unt.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Joye'll be givin' ye instructions, while I eyeball yer marksmanship.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Golems'll be your first target.
Focus on gettin' a feel for range and rhythm.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Try to avoid them coeurls!
Ye don't want to waste yer ammunition.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Next up, we're huntin' for bombs.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Not bad, lasslad, not bad at all.
Let's set ye against some proper nasties, though, eh?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Rostnsthal...
Ain't shehe done enough for a beginner?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Not by a long shot! I wanna see skins from a pair o' miacids, an' a pair o' tigers!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
You...you want herhim to fail.
I ain't lettin' you cheat his lordship!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: If you're gonna bend the rules, then so will I!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Do what ye gotta do, lass. I'll be waitin' for those skins at the 'ovel.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Cheatin' scum!
Come on, Forename!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Oh... Are we done?
I guess we're done...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Right! On to the Hermit's Hovel!

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Ye bring them skins, then?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Hmph. Even with young Joye's 'elp, ye did well, lassielad.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Huzzah! You will return to the manufactory with us, then?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: I said she'e did well─not that we was done! Ye still got one last target to take down: me!

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: Forename's got talent, but even shehe can't win against Rostnsthal!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: The man truly is being bothersome. Forename? Would you be so kind as to give the instructor a good drubbing?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Don't rush your shots!
Breathe. Think. Fire!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Good work, Forename!
You can win this!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Keep it up, Forename!
He's on his last legs!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
A thrilling performance!
You've saved the manufactory!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Well, there you are, instructor─Forename has proven herhis potential beyond the shadow of a doubt. You are a man of your word, are you not?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Aye, I'll come back to yer bloody workshop. ...But do ye know why I left in the first place?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: ...To once more breathe the salty air of your beloved homeland?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Hah! I ain't got no love for La Noscea. In fact, I'd be 'appy if I never saw the place again.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Then why would you inconvenience us by fleeing to a locale you so clearly despise!?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: For a sack o' gelt the size o' me bloody 'ead. I dunno who 'e was workin' for, but some bloke came around offerin' me good money to ship anchor. So I did.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Someone paid you to abandon the manufactory? Who would do such a thing...?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Like I said, I ain't never seen the sod afore. But if I show me face at the workshop, 'is boss is gonna want the gelt back, I reckon. Pity I already spent it all on grog...

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Oh, no no no─you'll not wiggle through my grasp that easily. I shall pay this debt, and in return you will instruct every would-be machinist who walks through our door.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Well, ye've got one bugger worth teachin', at least. I guess it's back into the frigid arms o' Lady Ishgard for me...

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: W-Was that wise, me lordship? The Haillenarte coffers ain't exactly fit to burstin'...

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Oh! Yes, you're quite right─we are rather short on coin. But I'm certain a thorough inspection of the ledgers will turn up a spare gil or two!

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: You can't put a price on good people, eh, me lordship?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: That you cannot, my dear. Rostnsthal may be a touch standoffish at times, but none can dispute his eye for marksmanship.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Such talk aside, I sense the business he had in these parts was not concluded to his satisfaction. Would that the man would confide in me his troubles... I suppose I shall have to content myself with the thought of his return.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: But you, Forename! You have exceeded my every expectation! Pray join me back at the manufactory that I might thank you in a manner that befits your accomplishments.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Ah, the savior of the Skysteel Manufactory! I had hoped to furnish you with a suitable reward, but a glance at the ledgers counsels me to wearisome prudence.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Thus, instead of presenting you with a firearm of the finest materials and latest design, I must humbly ask that you make do with the dated model I gave you at Camp Overlook.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Ah, and I must also pass on a message to you from Rostnsthal. He asks that you take the skills he has taught you thus far and “master 'em in the furnace o' battle.” Well, something to that effect.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: I assume he means to offer you further instruction once you display a sufficient level of competence. And such a day can hardly be distant for one of your talents, eh, Forename!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next machinist quest will be available from Stephanivien upon reaching level 35.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The requirements for undertaking subsequent quests can be reviewed in your journal.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

obj.n: Always the Last Place You Look
